00019 #ifndef _PRINT_BUFFER_SIZE_
00020 #define _PRINT_BUFFER_SIZE_ 2096
00021 #endif
00022 
00023 #ifndef _PRINT_PREFIX_WIDTH_
00024 #define _PRINT_PREFIX_WIDTH_ 42
00025 #endif
00026 
00027 #define PFF_( _x_ ) \
00028   std::string nfmt = _prefixFormatter(module,_x_) + fmt;                \
00029   va_list args;                                     \
00030   va_start(args,fmt);                                   \
00031   vsprintf(Messaging::_printBuffer,nfmt.c_str(),args);          \
00032   va_end(args);                                                         \
00033   std::string mmm(Messaging::_formatBuffer());              \
00034   printf(mmm.c_str());
00035

00076     static std::string _prefixFormatter(const std::string& module,
00077                     const std::string& level)
00078     { return module+std::string(" - ")+level+std::string(" - "); }

00267     typedef std::pair<std::string,std::string> key_t; 
00268     typedef std::map<key_t,TH1*>               map_t; 
00283     template<class H>
00284     void registerHist(H* pHist)
00285     { registerHist(m_defaultGroupName,pHist); }
00286 
00300     template<class H>
00301     void registerHist(const std::string& group,H* pHist)
00302     {
00303       if ( pHist != 0 )
00304     {
00305       key_t key(group,std::string(pHist->GetName()));
00306       if ( _histRegistry.find(key) == _histRegistry.end() )
00307         { _histRegistry.insert(map_t::value_type(key,(TH1*)pHist)); }
00308       else
00309         { Print::warning("HistHandler::registerHist(%p)",
00310                  "Histogram <%s/%s> already registered.",
00311                  (void*)pHist,key.first.c_str(),
00312                  key.second.c_str());}
00313     }
00314       else
00315     { 
00316       Print::error("HistHandler::registerHist(%p)",
00317                "Cannot register histogram, invalid pointer!",
00318                (void*)pHist); 
00319     }
00320     }
00321 
00322   private:
00323 
00325     HistHandler();
00326 
00328     map_t _histRegistry;
00329     
00331     static HistHandler* m_instance;
00332   };

00578 inline Services::HistHandler* Services::HistHandler::instance()
00579 { if ( m_instance == 0 ) { m_instance = new HistHandler(); } 
00580   return m_instance; }
00581 
00582 inline const std::string& Services::HistHandler::defaultGroupName() const
00583 { return m_defaultGroupName; }

00586 { const Services::HistHandler* pHist = Services::HistHandler::instance(); 
00587   return pHist->numberRegHist(); }

00590                                group)

00593 
00594 inline std::string Services::Messaging::_formatBuffer()
00595 {
00596   // some constants
00597   static const std::string _strEllipse("...");
00598   static const std::string _strSpace(" ");
00599   static const std::string _strBracket(")");
00600   static const size_t      _maxPreLength(_PRINT_PREFIX_WIDTH_);
00601   static const size_t      _boldOnLength(_boldOn.length());
00602   static const size_t      _boldOffLength(_boldOff.length());
00603 
00604   // extract prefix
00605   std::string msg(_printBuffer);
00606   size_t nbrkt(msg.find_first_of(_strBracket));
00607   if ( nbrkt == std::string::npos ) nbrkt = 0;
00608   size_t npref(msg.substr(nbrkt,msg.length()).find_first_of(_levelTag));
00609   npref += nbrkt;
00610   std::string prf(msg.substr(0,npref));
00611   size_t prl(prf.length());
00612 
00613   // compress if too long
00614   if ( prl > _maxPreLength )
00615     { 
00616       prf = prf.substr(0,_maxPreLength-_strEllipse.length())+_strEllipse; 
00617       prf.append(_boldOff);
00618     }
00619   else
00620     { 
00621       prf.append(_boldOff);
00622       int nwrds(_maxPreLength-prl);
00623       if ( nwrds > 0 ) prf.append((size_t)nwrds,' ');
00624     }
00625 //   printf("DEBUG: prelim  string length %i/%i (max)\n",
00626 //   (int)prl,_maxPreLength); 
00627   msg = _boldOn + prf + msg.substr(npref);
00628   return msg;
00629 }
00630 
00631 inline void Services::Process::terminate(const std::string& msg)
00632 {
00633   Print::info("Services::Process::terminate(...)",
00634           "\033[1m%s - STOP!\033[0m\n",msg.c_str());
00635   kill(getpid(),SIGTERM); 
00636 }
00637 
00638 inline bool Services::Utils::isVector(const std::string& str)
00639 { 
00640   size_t frt(str.find_first_of(_vbegin));
00641   if ( frt == std::string::npos ) return false;
00642   size_t bck(str.find_last_of(_vend));
00643   if ( bck == std::string::npos ) return false;
00644   return bck > frt;
00645 }
